<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>Deactivate HR Core ST Configurations</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[deactivateHRCoreConfig();

function deactivateHRCoreConfig() {
	var gr = new GlideRecord("ticket_configuration");			gr.addEncodedQuery("sys_idIN1890d1de737300105788e1e54cf6a742,4dd15dde737300105788e1e54cf6a75b,55e19dde737300105788e1e54cf6a76b,754159de737300105788e1e54cf6a704,7a2155de737300105788e1e54cf6a792,83a1d9de737300105788e1e54cf6a75b,b86159de737300105788e1e54cf6a7b5");
	gr.addActiveQuery();
	gr.query();
	while (gr.next()) {
		gr.setValue("active", false);
		gr.update();
	}
}
]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
